text: Montreat is a town in Buncombe County, North Carolina, United States. The population was 901 at the 2020 census. It is part of the Asheville city area. The town is best known for Montreat Conference Center, Montreat College, and for having been the home of the evangelist Billy Graham and his wife Ruth Bell Graham. ==References== Category:Towns in North Carolina
title: Montreat, North Carolina
